formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'QUEUE_MEMBER_COUNT' =-
[Syntax] QUEUE_MEMBER_COUNT(<queuename>)
[Synopsis] Count number of members answering a queue
[Description] Returns the number of members currently associated with the specified queue.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -8,3 +8,5 @@
[Description] Returns the number of members currently associated with the specified queue. + + This function has been deprecated in favor of the QUEUE_MEMBER function
